mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seat( seat_no, branch_no, seat_row, seat_col, seat_direction, seat_type, seat_state ) VALUES ( seat_seq.nextval, #{branch_no}, #{seat_row}, #{seat_col}, #{seat_direction}, #{seat_type}, #{seat_state} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM seat WHERE BRANCH_NO = #{branch_no} ORDER BY seat_row, seat_col ASC
SELECT T.seat_row FROM ( SELECT s.seat_row, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY s.branch_no ORDER BY s.seat_row DESC) AS RankNo FROM seat s ) T WHERE RankNo = 1
SELECT T.seat_col FROM ( SELECT s.seat_col, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY s.branch_no ORDER BY s.seat_col DESC) AS RankNo FROM seat s ) T WHERE RankNo = 1
